title: Episode 28: Is Time Out Really Effective?
description:
Everybody advocates the use of time out over forms of punishments like spankings, but how exactly do you administer time out in a way that is effective? Could we be doing it all wrong? Is time out...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com

itunes:subtitle: Do you use time out? Think it works? Do you suspect that perhaps it doesn't? Explore effective and ineffective uses of time out in this episode.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
